title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.18 - Future Climate Risk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-1.18 - Future Climate Risk

State Regulations

In addition to the other requirements set forth in this

Part, all facilities must take into account the provisions of ECL Article 40

Section 40-0113 to comply with the provisions of this Part. Subpart

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
598-1.18

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
